Subjects: Beatitudes; scripture texts, Engl. trans. of
_description: ‘A lernyng to good leuynge’ (the Sermon on the Mount) — twenty 8-line stanzas

BodDig102.First Lines:
POre of spirit blessed beþouȝ he be lord of richesse
                    fele…
BodDig102.Last Lines:
…In good werkis shyne ȝe bryȝtAnd lyue ȝe so
                    riȝt as ȝe byd
BodDig102.Editions:
Kail,  J.,
                        ed.  
             Twenty-Six Political and Other Poems…from Bodleian MSS Digby 102
                and Douce 322.
EETS
         o.s. 124 (1904; repr. 1973): 96-101.
